p: We developed a within-market probabilistic multi-strain SEIR Markovian model that allowed for co-infection with two strains [ 21, 22]. The stochastic infection dynamics were governed by transitions between states depicted in the electronic supplementary material, figure S1. Infection was either transmitted by direct within-flock transmission or environmental transmission through direct contact with infected drinking water, faeces or fomites [ 3, 21, 23]. Parameter values are provided in the electronic supplementary material, table S1.
